results.section:
赋能最新动态。
国信互联网观点：
海外云业务：基础设施先行，全球基础设施加速扩容，形成深耕亚洲、发力中东、辐射欧美格局。腾讯云
采取“基础设施先行”策略，在亚洲、中东、欧美加速数据中心布局，目前已覆盖全球22 个地区。其核
心优势在于技术领先（如媒体云、音视频传输、Fintech 场景）与深度本地化服务。通过成功迁移印尼GoTo、
泰国正大集团等标杆客户，证明了其以“高性价比”和优化架构（如提升响应速度、本地IDC 部署）切入
市场的能力。海外竞争相对温和，腾讯主攻聚焦在SaaS 和PaaS 业务，海外客户主要包含中企出海、本地
互联网企业等。面对芯片供应等问题，腾讯优先保障内部模型训练芯片储备，同时利用CPU 资源支撑推
理场景需求。除此以外，很多海外客户自身拥有GPU 资源，腾讯帮助客户更好地利用这些资源。
海外游戏业务：工业化能力兑现，GaaS 能力赋能。2025 年腾讯海外游戏增长强劲（Q3 同比+43%），我们
预计全年收入达757 亿元，占比腾讯游戏32%，提升3pct。加速主要系①腾讯工业化能力近年来逐渐成熟；
②收购海外游戏需要有4-5 年积累才能看到效果。腾讯合作态

Investment rationale 
We like Tencent for its best combination of AI-application-driven growth/stable 
competition/top shareholder returns at attractive valuation. We see Tencent as China's 
leading agentic AI company, with Weixin as the most natural mobile interface for LLM 
and AI agent integration. Within online game sector, Tencent is the clear leader in China 
with over 70% mobile game revenue market share. The company is leveraging its 
extensive game portfolio and operational expertise to capture emerging gameplay trends 
and diversify content globally. In addition to online game, Tencent captures significant 
spending-share and mind-share in virtual experience-based consumption market in 
China. Tencent operates China's largest online video/online music/online literature 
platforms in terms of paying user, with footprint now expanding into international 
markets.  
 
Upside catalysts 
• 
Stronger game performance during the peak season  
• 
Potential introduction of additional AI features within Weixin app 
• 
Potential upside in CAPEX driven by improved chip availability 
 
Risks 
• 
Competition from new traffic platforms and media formats 
• 
Regulatory risks across fintech, data collection and usage, online games, instant 
messaging, wireless services, app registration, minors’ protection 
• 
Weaker momentum for new game titles

Thailand in approximately six months.
What are TC’s strengths?
On traditional Iaas/Paas services, TC has leveraged its "battle-tested" capabilities from 
WeChat and gaming to have established a competitive edge in the Media cloud vertical, 
offering superior live streaming and real-time communication (RTC) solutions compared to 
competitors. Service quality acts as a further differentiator, with TC providing "white glove" 
localized engineering support that US hyperscalers often lack, which was a key factor in 
the GoTo/CP wins, according to management. Furthermore, Tencent offers unique 
connectivity with the vast Chinese consumer market for those international enterprises 
from travel, retail and hospitality industries that want to reach Chinese consumers via 
Tencent’s powerful WeChat ecosystem. 
On AI Infrastructure, TC positions itself as a "toolbox" provider, TC offers a full-stack AI 
solution from infrastructure to Agentic AI tools. A key advantage lies in operational 
efficiency; through deeply optimized storage and computation connections, TC claims to 
have achieved higher token production efficiency per GPU unit compared to standard 
setups.
Price war is more benign in SEA
Compared to the domestic cloud market in China, Tencent thinks the competition in the 
SEA cloud market has been more benign so far. This is partially because customers in 
that market value service reliability, local support, and specific product capabilities over 
just the cheapest service provi

results.title: Tencent Holdings Ltd.: Business Sharing Takeaways
results.section:
M
 Idea
Tencent Holdings Ltd.  | Asia Pacific
Business Sharing Takeaways 
We attended Tencent's business sharing in Bangkok where 
management outlines its strategies on international cloud and 
games. While Tencent's overseas games have started to bear 
fruit this year, we believe its international cloud opportunities 
are underappreciated by the market. OW and Top Pick.  
Tencent Cloud International: 
• Tencent Cloud covers 22 regions, 64 available zones, 200T reserved 
bandwidth, and 3,200+ acceleration nodes. In ASEAN, Tencent Cloud has 
three IDCs in both Thailand (third to be completed in coming months) and 
Indonesia, making it a leading cloud service provider (CSP) in the region.
• Key competitors in ASEAN include US and China  CSPs. We think Tencent's 
key advantages include competitive pricing, vertical experience (media, 
fintech, etc.), and in-house developed PaaS/SaaS solutions. Recent major 
customer acquisitions include GoTo (GoJek on-demand delivery)  in Indonesia 
and CP Group (supermarkets and department stores) in Thailand.
• HY2.0 is the first foundation model upgrade after restructuring its AI 
research lab ~6 months ago, with high-quality training datasets and 
revamped model architecture, which has been integrated into Tencent's apps. 
Tencent has sufficient chips for model training, although inference 
represents 70%+ of compute power. The company continues to prioritize 
chips for internal use and de-emphasize pure chip rental businesses.
Tencent Games (Overseas Games / Shooting Games Genre):
• China studios' success factors include: 1) Productivity differentials (labour, 
tools, work practices); 2) Category dynamics (martial arts, anime open world, 
competitive PVP, mobile strategy, mobile hyper causal); and 3) Products vs. 
platforms (apps stores, UGC, ads networks).
• Tencent believes its success factors include: 1) Data (exploring GaaS data and 
practices from China to rest of world); 2) Tools (bringing tools from rest of 
world to China)

results.title: First Read: Tencent Holdings "GCC 2026: AI potential to be unleashed" (Buy) Fong: GCC 2026: AI potential to be unleashed
results.section:
ing data privacy. On ToB, as Tencent prioritizes chip 
allocation for core businesses (ad and games), external cloud growth should remain 
healthy, albeit slower than peers. Chips and capex: Tencent maintain its commitment 
to capex, with the amount in line with peers over the past four quarters. Looking ahead, 
Tencent will compliantly procure high end chips from NVDA as the regulatory windows 
permit, while also sourcing chips from domestic suppliers whose performance is 
improving. Margin outlook: Given accelerating hiring, higher chip depreciation, as well 
as ramping up S&M on native AI applications (e.g. Yuanbao), Tencent's reinvestment 
strategy would likely narrow the gap between revenue and OP growth  in the near term.
Core businesses: Resilience offers steady cash flows for AI investment
Ad: Mgmt sees limited impact from ad tax and e-com tax thus far (see our report). Into 
2026, despite a higher growth base, mgmt remains confident about sustained topline 
growth. This is supported by: 1) continued AI-driven enhancement, enabled by the 
Hunyuan model's improving multi-modal capabilities which facilitate improved user 
behaviour analysis across Tencent's properties. AIM+, the AI-powered automated ad 
campaign tool that allows Tencent to manage bidding process on SMEs behalf, should 
also help broaden advertiser base and increase ROI. 2) Close-looped ecosystem, 
leveraging higher connectivity with Search, Video Accounts, Mini Programs and Mini 
Shops, to drive conversion and eCPM. 3) Increasing ad load in Video Accounts (currently 
4%; vs peers' 10-15%) and Search. Games: Mgmt views games growth trajectory as 
resilient, underpinned by 1) evergreen strategy, 14 evergreen games offering 
sustainable double digit growth, 2) the tap into the under-penetrated shooting game 
genre (Delta Force a successful example; Assault Fire, a PvE game, ranking 4th on its 
launch on 13 Jan), 3) AIGC, which improves the productivity of creating virtual items,

nd service know-how, while 
overseas studios often lead on authenticity and core design creativity.
In our view, Tencent’s organizational implication is a ‘best-of-both’ model: 
use China’s strength in live-service ops and data-driven optimization 
(games-as-a-service) to support global studios, while preserving studio-
level authenticity and diversity (single-player to multiplayer) to avoid 
homogenization. This is consistent with our long-duration earnings 
compounding thesis on Tencent: longer-lived franchises with stronger 
operations, plus a broader portfolio that reduces hit-dependence.

Alex Yao

alex.yao@jpmorgan.com
 
 
 
 
International cloud: selective wedges, AI tooling export, and what 
“success” should look like
Tencent Cloud’s international strategy is explicitly structured around 
efficient market entry and wedge widening. The go-to-market logic is to 
win key accounts (KAs) as showcases (GoTo cited) to build credibility and 
lower SME acquisition cost, with SME growth accelerated by KA success. 
This is paired with geographic prioritization (Thailand/Indonesia) and 
localized infrastructure investment (e.g., third data center in Thailand) to 
improve reliability and address enterprise needs. 
Differentiation is described less as a brute-force hyperscaler fight and more as 
vertical PaaS positioning – Tencent highlights strength in media and fintech 
solutions (including video/audio processing PaaS) and notes that some 
Western competitors have exited certain media services, creating openings. 
Investment Thesis 
As one of the most consensus OW names in the China internet space, Tencent’s solid operations should be sufficient for 
existing shareholders to hold onto positions but likely insufficient for incremental buyers. As a result, we believe upside to 
the current share price largely lies in earnings compound growth until changing fundamentals lead to a narrative change and 
valuatio

Social entertainment: On-line Karaoke is already a big part of social entertainment

This can help to bring more visibility for this business. Management expects stable 
Rmb6bn annual revenue for this business.

WeChat and gaming to have established a competitive edge in the Media cloud vertical, 
offering superior live streaming and real-time communication (RTC) solutions compared to 
competitors. Service quality acts as a further differentiator, with TC providing "white glove" 
localized engineering support that US hyperscalers often lack, which was a key factor in 
the GoTo/CP wins, according to management. Furthermore, Tencent offers unique 
connectivity with the vast Chinese consumer market for those international enterprises 
from travel, retail and hospitality industries that want to reach Chinese consumers via 
Tencent’s powerful WeChat ecosystem. 
On AI Infrastructure, TC positions itself as a "toolbox" provider, TC offers a full-stack AI 
solution from infrastructure to Agentic AI tools. A key advantage lies in operational 
efficiency; through deeply optimized storage and computation connections, TC claims to 
have achieved higher token production efficiency per GPU unit compared to standard 
setups.
Price war is more benign in SEA
Compared to the domestic cloud market in China, Tencent thinks the competition in the 
SEA cloud market has been more benign so far. This is partially because customers in 
that market value service reliability, local support, and specific product capabilities over 
just the cheapest service providers.  As such, TC is not pursuing a price

needs come more from inference vs training. There are numerous opportunities for SaaS and
transformation from SaaS to Agentic AI in Southeast Asia.

Company Description 
Tencent Music is a leading online music platform in China. 
After a merger with China Music Corp, it now operates 
multiple music apps, including QQ Music, Kugou, and Kuwo 
as well as WeSing, an online karaoke app. The company's 
monthly active user base reached 800m in 2022. Its 
business models include membership subscriptions, 
purchases of digital albums, virtual gifting to live 
performers and karaoke singers, sublicensing and 
advertising. 
 
Investment Rationale 
Tencent Music has a large user base that attracts content 
providers and multiple apps that cater for different user 
segments. Its social services such as live broadcasting and 
online karaoke contribute a significant portion of its 
revenues and hence allow the company to take a prudent 
and gradual approach to monetize via music subscription, 
implying further revenue upside in the long term. Growth in 
paying users and user spending can support profitability 
despite continuous content investment.

Top Stories
Tencent (0700) (0700.HK, OW – HK$596.50), China (Alex Yao)
Key Takeaways from Meetings with Gaming & International Cloud Leaders
We recently met Tencent’s management team across gaming and international cloud for a business update 
during the 2025 PMGC Grand Finals in Bangkok. Across both Gaming and International Cloud, the 
meetings reinforced our view that Tencent’s core advantage is not a single hit title or one-off customer win, 
but a repeatable operating system that is capable of spotting (or creating) the next ‘gameplay/workload’ 
inflection, industrializing execution (production, live ops, tooling), and localizing and scaling globally. We 
believe Tencent has structurally increased its exposure to new gameplay innovation waves via a publisher + 
developer/co-dev + investor ‘three-engine’ model, with particularly high exposure to the fast-growing 
extraction sub-genre (10% of 2025 shooter revenue vs 40% for battle royale today).
China Utilities & Renewables Blog, China (Alan Hon / Stephen Tsui, CFA)
EU’s shift to 15-min electricity pricing boosts ESS return, benefiting Sungrow; CNNC establishes an 
alliance on Gen IV nuclear commercialization; Sieyuan’s potential HK listing 
The European Union (EU) has recently shifted its day-ahead electricity market to a 15-min pricing interval 
(from 1-hour). According to Rystad Energy, this may boost ESS operator’s IRR by 3 percentage points. 
Sungrow (300274 CH, OW), ranking first in Europe’s market share in ESS integration, stands to benefit.

Tencent and we have terminated all existing exclusive music copyright licensing arrangements with the relevant upstream copyright holders subject to certain limited exceptions specified in the decision, and we will pursue nonexclusive collaborations with upstream copyright holders. results.title: 叠纸胜诉不正当竞争案，祖龙被判赔15万，但同时也在起诉叠纸
results.section: 两家互相起诉。文/王丹3月31日，江苏省苏州工业园区人民法院，就叠纸（原告）起诉祖龙（被告）商标侵权及不正当竞争纠纷一案，已终结审理，出具了民事判决书。叠纸在讼诉请求中表示，他们在2024年春节前夕发现，祖龙以“无限暖暖”“奇迹暖暖”“闪耀暖暖”“暖暖换装”“暖暖”作为搜索关键词，在腾讯运营的微信平台及微信广告平台投放大量视频广告，进行隐性使用和显性使用，来宣传《以闪亮之名》，因此起诉祖龙侵害《无限暖暖》《奇迹暖暖》《闪耀暖暖》注册商标专用权，并进行了不正当的竞争行为。在第二次庭审中，叠纸要求祖龙赔偿经济损失200万元，以及诉讼费、律师费、公证费等维权开支。关于微信平台视频广告的显性使用，祖龙举证表示该行为并非由己方实施。在发现该情况后，他们也曾多次向广告平台方投诉，认为叠纸提到的显性使用是由于相关平台方的技术原因造成的。此外关于隐性使用，祖龙表示，叠纸也在持续大量使用祖龙的游戏名称作为搜索关键词。叠纸并未对腾讯（第三人）提出诉讼请求，但后者作为平台方，也进行了事实陈述。腾讯方表示，自己没有对涉案关键词进行任何编辑修改选择，关键词是祖龙自行添加的。经后台查询，“奇迹暖暖”“闪耀暖暖”“

Company Description
Tencent has the largest online community in China. It was founded with the launch of instant 
messaging platform QQ but has since grown into a diversified internet company with core 
focuses on gaming, social media and networking (Weixin/WeChat), fintech (WeChat Pay), 
cloud computing and digital content. The company also holds a substantial investment 
portfolio of public and private companies.
Valuation Method and Risk Statement
Our price target is based on sum of the parts. 
We believe the key risks for Tencent include: 1) an evolving and intensifying competitive 
landscape; 2) new business execution; 3) integration of invested companies and businesses; 
4) rising costs of traffic acquisition, content and brand promotions; 5) IT system upkeep; 6) 
expansion into international markets; 7) infringement of intellectual property rights; 8) 
departures of key management; and 9) regulatory risks.

results.section: 合作初期签订合同时即应当确定如下关键条款，砌好“防火墙”：1、停运条款：明确约定停运需经双方书面同意，或者明确研发方行使单方合同解除权的条件，避免使用类似“运营收益不理想”等模糊标准；设置提前通知期和研发方继续运营的优先权；设定高额违约金以制约随意停运。2、数据归属：在合同中明确用户数据等核心资产的所有权由双方共同享有，以及合作终止后，研发方能顺利拿回或继续享有数据权限。3、资金结算：建议对高流水产品设立共管账户，或接入研发方可控的分账渠道，以防范资金风险。02“全面模仿”网易知名游戏，被判赔400万元近期，《率土之滨》与《千军计》的著作权侵权及不正当竞争纠纷案终有定论。广州知识产权法院作出二审判决，认定北京展游科技有限公司开发的游戏《千军计》，构成对杭州网易雷火科技有限公司的不正当竞争，判令展游公司赔偿网易雷火公司400万元。本案争议焦点在于游戏《率土之滨》的整体内容是否构成受著作权法保护的“类电作品”。网易公司主张，其2017年版游戏的整体内容构成类电作品，《千军计》的抄袭行为侵犯其著作权并构成不正当竞争，索赔1010万元。一审法院曾认定《率土之滨》构成类电作品，并判决著作权侵权成

results.title: 上市前夕再收36万罚单！小鹅通合规漏洞难堵，三年半累计亏损超9000万
results.section: 2025年11月，深圳小鹅网络技术有限公司（下称 “小鹅通”）收到深圳市市场监督管理局送达的《行政处罚决定书》（深市监处罚〔2025〕12 号），因存在网络交易违法行为，被处以36万元罚款。这已是小鹅通两年内第二次因同类问题被罚，距离其2025年8月向港交所递交招股书、冲刺主板上市仅过去三个月，合规隐忧成为其IPO路上的重要挑战。此次处罚依据《中华人民共和国电子商务法》第八十三条，直指小鹅通未履行平台核心责任：要么对平台内经营者侵害消费者合法权益的行为未采取必要措施，要么未对入驻商家尽到资质资格审核义务，要么未保障消费者安全权益。回溯2023年11月，小鹅通就曾因相同法律条款下的违规行为，被处以5万元罚款。短短两年内两次 “踩线”，暴露其在平台生态治理上的持续性漏洞 —— 尽管招股书中承诺 “禁止客户利用解决方案从事非法活动”，但实际运营中却未能有效落地监管措施。公开信息显示，小鹅通成立于2015年2月，核心产品 “小鹅通平台” 为企业提供产品交付、营销获客、用户运营等一站式服务，业务高度依赖腾讯生态：腾讯不仅是其最大外部股东（持股16.82%），更是其技术与流量核心 —— 服务多通过

2.3.0 腾讯C端AI布局：现有产品增加AI功能+原生AI应用，近期加大人才投入
腾讯的C端产品覆盖社交、游戏、音乐、视频、出行等几乎所有领域，两大思路实现AI化：
现有产品增加AI功能：微信、QQ浏览器、腾讯文档、腾讯会议、地图等多个应用均已增加AI功能；
原生AI应用：目前主要是AI助手元宝和AI知识库ima两大产品，提供AI搜索、文档生成等一系列AI功能，与
腾讯产品生态充分融合。
近期加大人才投入。今年12月17日，腾讯宣布组织架构调整，姚顺雨（原OpenAI研究员）出任首席AI科学家
，兼任AI Infra部和大语言模型部负责人，向总裁刘炽平及技术工程事业群总裁卢山双线汇报；此前据The
Information报道，腾讯向字节跳动AI研究员开出薪资翻倍的挖角条件，且不是个案，字节大模型团队中的部
分核心研究员已接受腾讯的邀约。

入OpenAI背景的首席AI科学家姚顺雨，展现出其在人工

包括字节跳动在内的顶尖AI人才，尤其是在校招中表现出“不惜成本”的投入态势。这
种高强度的人才争夺，一方面反映了行业对高端AI资源的迫切需求，另一方面也预
示着未来大模型领域竞争将进一步升级。从战略角度看，腾讯此次调整体现了其从
业务协同转向技术深耕的思路转变，通过统一研发体系、夯实基础设施，试图在生
成式AI的长期竞争中构建更稳固的技术护城河。

Key Takeaways from Management Business Sharing in Thailand Dec

CITI’S TAKE 
On Dec 14 we attended Tencent’s business sharing in Bangkok where CSO 
James Mitchell and management from cloud and games division shared 
Tencent’s strategies and prospects on international cloud business, AI 
gaming adoption, Tencent Games publishing and overseas expansion, as 
well as overall shooting game opportunities ahead of the PUBG Mobile 
Global Championship (PMGC) finale event. We remain confident of 
Tencent’s leadership in global game industry leveraging high hit rates in 
key genres especially shooter games, comprehensive capabilities across 
games development, publishing and investments and unparalleled 
advantages across data, authenticity, longevity and creativity. As one of 
the core AI players in China, Tencent Games further leverages Tencent’s 
proprietary and open-source AI technologies to achieve productivity gains 
in digital asset creation and coding assistance, while Tencent Cloud 
further expands rapidly in overseas market capturing robust AI demand 
opportunity. Maintain Buy and top pick status for Tencent with HK$751 
TP.

摩根大通与其研究报告所覆盖的公司开展业务，或寻求与这些公司开展业务。因此，投资者应意识到其中可能存
在利益冲突，进而可能会影响本报告的客观性。投资者在做出投资决策时，本报告之观点应仅作为投资者的考虑
因素之一。
最近我们在曼谷2025 年和平精英全球总决赛期间与公司游戏和国际
云管理团队面对面交流了最新业务情况。对于游戏和国际云业务，两
次会面都印证了我们的观点，即腾讯的核心优势并非某款热门游戏或
一次性获客，而是可重复的运行体系，后者能够发现（或创造）下一
个‘玩法/负载’拐点，实现工业化执行（生产、实时运营、工具集
成）以及全球范围内的本地化和扩展。我们认为腾讯通过发行商+开
发商/联合开发商+投资人的“三引擎”模式，结构性提升了新玩法创
新浪潮在其业务中的占比，其中快速增长的
